Text: Truly is an American rock band formed in the wake of the grunge era.

<Text: Truly:  It featured singer-guitarist Robert Roth, bassist Hiro Yamamoto, and drummer Mark Pickerel.>

<Text: Truly:  Yamamoto and Pickerel were founding members respectively of Soundgarden and Screaming Trees.>

Text: Truly:  While not a commercially successful group like some of their Seattle contemporaries, the band lasted a decade with two studio albums to their name.
